reviewText:

reviewText:
There needs to be some sort of rule implemented in the Greenlight process where you're forced to tell voters the pitch for the opening act of your game because this one... lord have mercy.

How about I throw you in a pitch black prison and then force you to run around trying to find a flashlight?"
-backhands across face-
"What if you have to find the battery separately?"
-closes fist
date:
strikes hard at nose-
"NNGH. Did I say battery? I meant batteries. They're in two different-"
-delivers crushing right to the ribcage-
"(wheezing
recommended:
desperately fighting back vomit) ...and then I make it somehow harder to see where you're going WITH the torch than without i-"
-repeated knees to the groin fill up Ultra Meter-
-bellows in the language of the old gods as hurricane kicks tear reality itself from the staples of scientific law-
-downvotes Satanist-

TL;DR: It needs some work.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1QdsnePWJEA"
votesHelpful: 143 of 153 people (93%) found this review helpful 109 people found this review funny

reviewText: I normally don\'t write reviews, but my god this game was awful. Pitch black, can\'t see anything. Have to search for things with no idea what your searching for. Full of dark rooms that do NOTHING for the story. Spent 45 min looking for batteries in this god awful game. Save your money.
